title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Example Project

Vaccine trial, across several countries, low-incidence rate - so need to recruit large number of patients across multiple countries.
Create simulated Virtual Populations using KerusCloud with recruitment sites in 4 different countries, baseline patient data and repeated measure & time to event variables of disease occurrence.

title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Patient Recruitment


Conventional approaches to clinical trial design often neglect logistical issues, such as recruiting patients.


KerusCloud allows you recruit patients from up to
10 sites.

title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Patient Recruitment


KerusCloud allows you to modify recruitment rates between sites and over time.
